TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Fuxing_(Taoyuan), title = Fuxing_(Taoyuan), year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuxing_(Taoyuan)} }

S.FORM: Fuxing a sakuwan ku Taoyuan. kumud nu kalesakan, 336.75 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 195.32 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 120.65 km²), u kasabinawlan, 10,692 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 3,655 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 6,817 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 64%(Tayal) ku kasabinawlan. u Tayal ku sakalaniyazu'. nikasakuwakuwan Fuxing mala 10 a cuwen atu 58 ku niyazu'. kina 58 a niyazu'sa, Pyasan , Rahaw(Takan) , Wsilung , Hbun , Hbun-sinqumi , Kinyawpan , Rangay , Kawbu' , Khpan , Raga' , Rahu' , Qapu' , Qus , Yubang , Triqan , Zihing , Kayu-baliq , Kzyay , Tuba , Luhung , Blhuy , Blhuy , Bilus , Qoyaw , Qoyaw , Silong , Qoyaw , Snazi , Kin'lwan , Sqiy , Cyasi , Yuwhbun raka , Kayway , Qus , Qmocyan , Babau , Qnau , Ksunu' , Qehuy , Kuli , Sbunaw , Quri , Uruw , Tkasan , Raka , Piyaway , Tgleq , Saruc , Twan nokan , Zihing , Qrahu , Tqwiy , Ngurus , Qphay , Balung , 'Bu balung , Qara , Quzi . 復興區(泰雅語:Pyasan) . Fuxing "Ataya a kamu, Pyasan" nu Cung-hua-min-cu Tau-yuan a sakuwan tini i nuwalian nutimulan nu Tau-yuan, nu wamisan a belaw u 大溪 a kakitizaan, nuwalian nuamisan belaw u 新北市三峽 a kakitizaan, ,烏來a kakitizaan, patatules nuwalian nutimulan 臺灣省宜蘭a kuwan 大同鄉 a kenis, satipan nutimulan atu satipan nuwamisan belaw u 臺灣省新竹 a kuwan 尖石鄉a kenis, ,關西鎮a kenis. ahebal nu hekal pakala tu 351 ping-bang-kung-li, "macalap tu Tau-yuan pulung nu hekal a lala' pitu hun tu tusa", u tademaw pakala tu 1.2 bang satabakiay a hekal nu Tau-yuan, caay kaktuud ku tademaw, adidi' ku sakuwan a tademaw, i labuay muenengay a tademaw hatu 臺灣原住民族泰雅 a binacadan. 依照" . kilul tu "hulic a lekec nu kakitizaaan" Fuxing a sakuwan nu Yin-cu-min-cunay a sakuwan, nu sihulicay teked a sakaput a tademaw i Tau-yuan a kenis atu nu zumaay a sakuwan caay kalecad ku kawaw, nu kenisay akakitizaan u teked ku situngusay, 復興區a yakuba u teked amikawaw caay ku nu Tau-yuan caay kunipacuculan nu cenbu, a patizeng tu Fuxing a dayhiwan tu pakaniay tu sateked a kawaw a pahulic. laylay Pyasan, Pyasan , . malumanay a ngangan "Caw-ban-san" han, pikuwanan nu Lipun a ziday nu Sin-cu-cou Ta-si binacadan a lala' zikuzan nu ngangayawan saayaway patizeng tu Caw-ban a kenis. u ngangan nu kakitizaana lalayan i 1886 a mihcaan ci Liu-min-cuan i tini amiazih, maazih kya Da-ke-kan a sauwac tusaay a tukus u satukay a sauwac mahiza u tuluay a kalimucu' a sapad, pangangan han tu kalimucu' buyu' a sapad han. u zikuzaay nu kahung-tian a ziday,tiniay pangangan han tu Cya-ban-san, uynian a buyu' i Atayla a ngangan Pyasan han, uyni a imi u sapabaliw tu kakitizaan a tuud, nuzumaan a kamu nu Atayla a kamu Pyasan "pi-ya-san" han, namakay nu Atayla a nuyazu' tumuk a ngangan, sazikuzay nu hun-tu a ziday amitena' tu kunu hulam midebung a mingayaw tu a mapatay, u sapakinin tu nu binacadan a tademaw a pangangan. . pikuwanan hena nu Lipun, mikantukay nu cebu midemec tizaay mueneng a Yin-cu-min, pasumad han ku ngangan nu kakitizaan tu "Ciyaw-pan-san" ngangan tu mizipa' ku kuku' i sapad. makay pikuwanan henay nu Lipun muculal tu ku masakalimucu' buyu' a sapad-piazih, hananay u kamu nipangangan ni Liw-min-cwn, atu kanu nu kamu,nika 1899 a mihcaan "Taywan syehuy pakatineng" u pacebaay a ngangan pabacu' tu kalimucu' sapad buyu' u ngiha nu layakay tu "カッバンソァン" katineng tu ngangan nu kalimucu' sapat buyu' i pikantuk nu cenbu ayaw nu 1899 a mihca izaw tu. aca, "tazipaan a sapad" caay tu ku nu Lipunay a kamu. sumad ngangan 1954年10月31 . 1954 a mihcaan cacay a bataan izaw ku tulu a bataan izaw ku cacay tu nu Bu-sin-syang. itawya nisutan i sin-bun,"Yin-cu-min a palimulak tu kalecuhan nu Cung-tung tungusay cumelak ku kanatal". u yakuba ku paketunay misinsin i sey-bu a malaheci. namahiza i Cyaw-pan adidi'ay a cacudadan nu wawa pasumad han ku ngangan Cye-suw adidi'ay a cacudadan han, pili' i pulecuhan ni Cyang-cung-cen miteka..2014 a mihcaan sabaw tusa a bulad tusa a bataan izaw ku lima a demiad, Taw-yen a kuwan sumad han tu Csya-se tu Taw-yen a kenis hawsa, Bu-sin a kenis pasumad han tu se-sya a kakitizaantu Bu-sin a kakitizaan. panukas tu ngangan 2014年" . 2014 a mihca "Taywan Yin-cu-min a niyazu' mikawaw tu masasepaw" nipaketunan sumad tu ngangan "Pi-ya-way' hakiya "Pi-ya-san" nglab ayawtu izaw tu ku natatengilan misumad tu ngangan "Cyaw-pan han", nika katuud ku paculiay a binawlan. lalangawan ungsing pikuwanan henay nu Lipun, Bu-sin a kenis lima ku nipatadas tu unsing, macacidek u S-lin unsing, Sin-sin unsing, Kaw-i' unsing, Pa-lin-cyaw unsing, Siw-u-lay unsing, cay ku Slin unsing atu Sin-sin unsing dada', izaw hena ku zumaay a unsing i capi nu siy-li a sasanga'an namisanga' maenip i diheb nu sauwac, Pa-lin a unsing i 1997 a mihca muliyaw makazih, pangangan han Ye-hen unsing.

Foxing a sakowan ko Taoyoan. komod no kalesakan, 336.75 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 195.32 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 120.65 km²), o kasabinawlan, 10,692 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 3,655 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 6,817 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 64%(Tayal) ko kasabinawlan. o Tayal ko sakalaniyazo'. nikasakowakowan Foxing mala 10 a cowen ato 58 ko niyazo'. kina 58 a niyazo'sa, Pyasan , Rahaw(Takan) , Wsilong , Hbon , Hbon-sinqomi , Kinyawpan , Rangay , Kawbo' , Khpan , Raga' , Raho' , Qapo' , Qos , Yobang , Triqan , Zihing , Kayo-baliq , Kzyay , Toba , Lohong , Blhoy , Blhoy , Bilos , Qoyaw , Qoyaw , Silong , Qoyaw , Snazi , Kin'lwan , Sqiy , Cyasi , Yowhbon raka , Kayway , Qos , Qmocyan , Babao , Qnao , Ksono' , Qehoy , Koli , Sbonaw , Qori , Urow , Tkasan , Raka , Piyaway , Tgleq , Saroc , Twan nokan , Zihing , Qraho , Tqwiy , Ngoros , Qphay , Balong , 'Bo balong , Qara , Qozi . 復興區(泰雅語:Pyasan) . Foxing "Ataya a kamo, Pyasan" no Cong-hoa-min-co Tao-yoan a sakowan tini i nowalian notimolan no Tao-yoan, no wamisan a belaw o 大溪 a kakitizaan, nowalian noamisan belaw o 新北市三峽 a kakitizaan, ,烏來a kakitizaan, patatoles nowalian notimolan 臺灣省宜蘭a kowan 大同鄉 a kenis, satipan notimolan ato satipan nowamisan belaw o 臺灣省新竹 a kowan 尖石鄉a kenis, ,關西鎮a kenis. ahebal no hekal pakala to 351 ping-bang-kong-li, "macalap to Tao-yoan polong no hekal a lala' pito hon to tosa", o tademaw pakala to 1.2 bang satabakiay a hekal no Tao-yoan, caay kaktood ko tademaw, adidi' ko sakowan a tademaw, i laboay moenengay a tademaw hato 臺灣原住民族泰雅 a binacadan. 依照" . kilol to "holic a lekec no kakitizaaan" Foxing a sakowan no Yin-co-min-conay a sakowan, no siholicay teked a sakapot a tademaw i Tao-yoan a kenis ato no zomaay a sakowan caay kalecad ko kawaw, no kenisay akakitizaan o teked ko sitongosay, 復興區a yakoba o teked amikawaw caay ko no Tao-yoan caay konipacocolan no cenbo, a patizeng to Foxing a dayhiwan to pakaniay to sateked a kawaw a paholic. laylay Pyasan, Pyasan , . malomanay a ngangan "Caw-ban-san" han, pikowanan no Lipon a ziday no Sin-co-coo Ta-si binacadan a lala' zikozan no ngangayawan saayaway patizeng to Caw-ban a kenis. o ngangan no kakitizaana lalayan i 1886 a mihcaan ci Lio-min-coan i tini amiazih, maazih kya Da-ke-kan a saowac tosaay a tokos o satokay a saowac mahiza o toloay a kalimoco' a sapad, pangangan han to kalimoco' boyo' a sapad han. o zikozaay no kahong-tian a ziday,tiniay pangangan han to Cya-ban-san, oynian a boyo' i Atayla a ngangan Pyasan han, oyni a imi o sapabaliw to kakitizaan a tood, nozomaan a kamo no Atayla a kamo Pyasan "pi-ya-san" han, namakay no Atayla a noyazo' tomok a ngangan, sazikozay no hon-to a ziday amitena' to kono holam midebong a mingayaw to a mapatay, o sapakinin to no binacadan a tademaw a pangangan. . pikowanan hena no Lipon, mikantokay no cebo midemec tizaay moeneng a Yin-co-min, pasomad han ko ngangan no kakitizaan to "Ciyaw-pan-san" ngangan to mizipa' ko koko' i sapad. makay pikowanan henay no Lipon mocolal to ko masakalimoco' boyo' a sapad-piazih, hananay o kamo nipangangan ni Liw-min-cwn, ato kano no kamo,nika 1899 a mihcaan "Taywan syehoy pakatineng" o pacebaay a ngangan pabaco' to kalimoco' sapad boyo' o ngiha no layakay to "カッバンソァン" katineng to ngangan no kalimoco' sapat boyo' i pikantok no cenbo ayaw no 1899 a mihca izaw to. aca, "tazipaan a sapad" caay to ko no Liponay a kamo. somad ngangan 1954年10月31 . 1954 a mihcaan cacay a bataan izaw ko tolo a bataan izaw ko cacay to no Bo-sin-syang. itawya nisotan i sin-bon,"Yin-co-min a palimolak to kalecohan no Cong-tong tongosay comelak ko kanatal". o yakoba ko paketonay misinsin i sey-bo a malaheci. namahiza i Cyaw-pan adidi'ay a cacodadan no wawa pasomad han ko ngangan Cye-sow adidi'ay a cacodadan han, pili' i polecohan ni Cyang-cong-cen miteka..2014 a mihcaan sabaw tosa a bolad tosa a bataan izaw ko lima a demiad, Taw-yen a kowan somad han to Csya-se to Taw-yen a kenis hawsa, Bo-sin a kenis pasomad han to se-sya a kakitizaanto Bo-sin a kakitizaan. panokas to ngangan 2014年" . 2014 a mihca "Taywan Yin-co-min a niyazo' mikawaw to masasepaw" nipaketonan somad to ngangan "Pi-ya-way' hakiya "Pi-ya-san" nglab ayawto izaw to ko natatengilan misomad to ngangan "Cyaw-pan han", nika katood ko pacoliay a binawlan. lalangawan ongsing pikowanan henay no Lipon, Bo-sin a kenis lima ko nipatadas to onsing, macacidek o S-lin onsing, Sin-sin onsing, Kaw-i' onsing, Pa-lin-cyaw onsing, Siw-o-lay onsing, cay ko Slin onsing ato Sin-sin onsing dada', izaw hena ko zomaay a onsing i capi no siy-li a sasanga'an namisanga' maenip i diheb no saowac, Pa-lin a onsing i 1997 a mihca moliyaw makazih, pangangan han Ye-hen onsing.
